Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Fit Criterion: Dr Susan Poslusny and Karen Sysol are the only people who shall have access to the final class section scheduling for the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall contain contact information (e-mail and phone number) for all people relevant to the system including (but not limited to) staff members students lecture instructors clinical lab instructors and clinical site administrators.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall comply with corporate color scheme': Look and Feel

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'The Disputes System must provide Search functionality. Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
